name: Puzzler World 2013
synopsis: Work through over 1200 puzzles in 27 different categories. Challenge your skills with Wordsearch, Takegaki, Fitword, Sudoku, Pathfinder, Spot the Difference, Codeword, Sum People, Backwords, Link-A-Pix, and Split Words puzzles, to name a few! Play Challenge Mode to unlock Master Mode puzzles for even more games and brain-bending challenges. This is the ultimate compilation for puzzle lovers everywhere!
